item.title: Michael add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Remember that wherever your heart is, there you will find your treasure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michael add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Don't think about what you've left behind" The alchemist said to the boy as they began to ride across the sands of the desert. "If what one finds is made of pure matter, it will never spoil. And one can always come back. If what you had found was only a moment of light, like the explosion of a star, you would find nothing on your return." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michael add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michael add a quote by Hiromu Arakawa
item.description: "Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world that exists outside ourselves and our dreams." -- Hiromu Arakawa

item.title: Michael add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Michael add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Death must be so beautiful. To lie in the soft brown earth, with the grasses waving above one's head, and listen to silence. To have no yesterday, and no tomorrow. To forget time, to forgive life, to be at peace." -- Oscar Wilde
